channel.title: Ugh..Server Troubles..Agian
channel.description:
Alright, So im having a bit of trouble with my server, Seems like this is a common thing. So Im going to ask for a little help. Ive tried almost everything suggested by the people that are on the forums. Mod T's Guide was ok But I never got the sources correct. I have Hamaichi, like someone told me to get. And I also have Mod T's Server Program..But it keeps saying that I dont have Java componets..So I went to get JDK 6.0 and after it FINALLY was done downloading...It said I dont have the correct updates to Java. And i think that part of the problem is that it cant find Java becasue I changed the Varibles on It when I went to >Start>Control Panal>System>Enviromental..And So now its In The Bin?? Ughh Idk. Im just trying to get my server up. Any Suggestions would be gladly glady Appreciated.
~hoft Admin of - '1337 Ownage' Player Moderator of - 'BlackScape'

item.title: Ugh..Server Troubles..Agian
item.dc:creator: @hoft hoft
item.description:
@hoft wrote:

     Alright, So im having a bit of trouble with my server, Seems like this is a common thing.

So Im going to ask for a little help. Ive tried almost everything suggested by the people that
are on the forums. Mod T’s Guide was ok But I never got the sources correct. I have Hamaichi, like someone

updates to Java. And i think that part of the problem is that it cant find Java becasue I changed the Varibles on It when I went to >Start>Control Panal>System>Enviromental…And So now its In The Bin?? Ughh Idk. Im just trying to get my server up. Any Suggestions would be gladly glady Appreciated.
